meanings.definition: A type of Indian street food made with puffed rice, vegetables, and tangy tamarind sauce.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed eating the spicy bhel at the food festival.
meanings.sent2: The bhel was a flavorful mix of crunchy rice and fresh veggies.
meanings.sent3: When the bhel fell on my lap, it looked like a colorful mess!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of bhel, spreading joy all around.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bhel lingered in the air, tempting everyone nearby.

meanings.definition: To mix or toss ingredients together, typically in a salad or snack.
meanings.sent1: I will bhel the salad before serving it for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She likes to bhel the popcorn with different seasonings.
meanings.sent3: As a joke, he tried to bhel the puzzle pieces together.
meanings.sent4: The wind seemed to bhel the leaves in a playful dance.
meanings.sent5: The chef's hands moved swiftly to bhel the ingredients into a delicious dish.
